title: Everything looks too small suddenly. And...other issues.
content: Everything looks too small suddenly. Not REAL small but smaller. It looks weird. the "restore previous session" thing is grayed out. When I press alt I do not get a special firefox menu as your advice mentioned. I am not finding 'view' on any menu. So I cannot reset stuff. Also I can't seem to even find where to add extensions. I tried the refresh firefox thing and it didn't help.
